question:
Consider the following statements about the Integrated Power Development Scheme (IPDS):
  1. It aims at strengthening of sub-transmission and distribution network in the urban areas
  2. It envisages metering of distribution transformers and feeders in the urban areas
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Integrated Power Development Scheme (IPDS) has been launched with the objectives of: 
  • Strengthening of sub-transmission and distribution network in the urban areas
  • Metering of distribution transformers and feeders in the urban areas
  • IT enablement of distribution sector and strengthening of distribution network 
  • It helps in reduction in AT&C losses
  • Establishment of IT enabled energy accounting / auditing system
